薞字的基本解释

薞
sūn
〔薞芜〕即“酸模”，一种草本植物，嫩茎可食，全草入药。

薞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sūn］
［《廣韻》思渾切，平魂，心。］
亦作“薞1”。
见“蕵蕪”。

薞字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薞； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1061第28
【唐韻】思渾切【韻會】蘇昆切，?音孫。【爾雅·釋草】蘾，烏薞。又：須，薞蕪。【註】薞蕪似羊蹄，葉細，味酢，可食。　【篇海】一作?。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋草】蘹，烏薞。〕　謹照原文蘹改蘾。
薞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
薞字的起名意思

暂无。

Scallop
Basic explanation of words
Scallop
sūn
〔Wu Wu〕 means "Rumex", a kind of herb, the tender stem is edible, and the whole herb is used as medicine.
Scallop
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sūn］
["Guangyun" thinking vigorously, calm soul, heart. ]
Also known as "薞1".
See "Haiwu".
Scallop
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　薞; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1061 28
[Tang Yun] Sihunqie [Rhyme Hui] Su Kunqie,? Yinsun. 【Erya·Shucao】蘾，乌薞. Also: beard, Wu Wu. [Note] Wuwu resembles sheep's hooves, leaves thin, flavorful, and edible.　【Pianhai】A work?. Textual research: [[Erya·Shucao] 蘹，乌薞. 〕　I would like to change it according to the original text.
